sub_topic: Probability of a certain type of social event occurring in a community
message_1: In a certain community, 40% of the residents are under the age of 18. Calculate the probability that a randomly selected resident is not under the age of 18.
message_2: If 40% of the residents are under the age of 18, then the remaining 60% are not under the age of 18. Therefore, the probability that a randomly selected resident is not under the age of 18 is 60% or 0.6.
